thanks
regards...


2010/11/22 burakkk <burak.isikli@...>

> Hi,
> I'm trying to crawl a web site but it failed.
> Job log is that:
>
> 2010-11-22T14:40:19.206Z SEVERE Invalid property 'httpProxyPort' of bean
> class [org.archive.modules.fetcher.FetchHTTP]: Bean property 'httpProxyPort'
> is not writable or has an invalid setter method. Did you mean
> 'httpProxyHost'?; Can't create bean 'fetchHttp'; Can't create bean
> 'fetchProcessors'; ; Can't create bean 'crawlController'; Can't create bean
> 'statisticsTracker'; ; Can't create bean 'seeds'; ; Can't create bean
> 'org.archive.modules.deciderules.surt.SurtPrefixedDecideRule#157ea4a'; Can't
> create bean 'scope'; ; Can't create bean 'frontier'
>
> 2010-11-22T14:40:19.206Z SEVERE Invalid property 'httpProxyPort' of bean
> class [org.archive.modules.fetcher.FetchHTTP]: Bean property 'httpProxyPort'
> is not writable or has an invalid setter method. Did you mean
> 'httpProxyHost'?; Can't create bean 'fetchHttp'; Can't create bean
> 'fetchProcessors'; ; Can't create bean 'crawlController'; Can't create bean
> 'statisticsTracker'; ; Can't create bean 'seeds'; ; Can't create bean
> 'org.archive.modules.deciderules.surt.SurtPrefixedDecideRule#157ea4a'; Can't
> create bean 'scope'; ; Can't create bean 'frontier'
>
> What's the problem?
>
> Regards..
>
> --

> *
